channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Hello, I want to make my server Edgeville pvp i have tried to copy the coords from edgeville pking from demise pking but i wouldnt work tried all of the TUT from other people but i couldnt find it! :( Can somewane please help
Thanks!

Can somewane please help

I wanne make it a pvp server so edgeville bank safe zone and then like mid varrock pvp hot zone (multi Zone)
I could help you IF I knew what you want us to help you out with.[/quote]

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

So,you wanna make the whole of edgeville,wildy?
Well,im not much on this but i know it basically
Think of the whole of edgville as a box
Now somewhere in your source,there will be places where you add wildy coords(again,sorry i dont know where exactly). anyway,you just need to find each corner of this edgeville ‘box’ and do ::mypos or w.e . Then,put these coords in your wildy and it kind of connects the corners together and makes that whole ‘box’ Wildy. This is also how pkboxes are made. Sorry i couldnt be of more use
Good luck Mate

Read full topic
